page.title: 15 Farming around Otley
page.content:
Shrubbery Farm At this farm they grow wheat,barley, beans and oil seed rape.The crops are rotated in the usual manner.The machinery includes tractors,seeders and combines.The owners keep cattle and pigs.Although the farm covers 48 hectares.As is fairly normal in this area there are no small fields.
Wrights Farm This farm has 308 acres.They grow sugar beet,wheat,barley and oil seed rape.They have 6 tractors,1 combine, 1 cultivator and a plough.They have about 60 beef cattle.The normal pattern of rotation is undertaken. About 15 acres are given over to pasture.
